about_the_game:
UNLOCK THE POWER OF INFINITE STORYTELLING!

Multiverse Designer is an innovative 3D virtual tabletop and map creator, a unique toolbox to empower storytellers and create the most immersive RPG experiences. Save hours of your time creating awe-inspiring setpieces with thousands of 3D assets, effects and features thanks to its procedural generation systems and intuitive drag-and-drop UI; or customize everything to its finest detail, from texture to lights or colors. Put your players or yourself in the heros' boots, exploring your creations with real-time fog of war and dynamic lights and shadows. You can even create epic cutscenes with animated assets, camera angles and dialogues!

Use your creations to play any game, any genre, any setting -- from fantasy to sci-fi, from horror to comedy. Multiverse Designer includes Criteria, an easy-to-learn scripting language that you can use to implement rules and character sheets, automate events, or even include RPG rulesets of your own creation in the game, so Multiverse Designer takes care of all the bookkeeping for you!

Multiverse Designer is more than just a software. It’s a venue for your creativity, expression, and entertainment. It’s a way to unleash your imagination and live your dreams. It’s a path to become a storyteller!

CREATE EPIC CUTSCENES

Discover your inner filmmaker with the Cutscene Director. This powerful moviemaking tool allows you to animate assets, change their positions, rotations, and locations, and create dynamic cutscenes that enrich your storytelling. Seamlessly blend character animations, control time, and experiment with camera angles to create captivating cinematic experiences.

PLAY WITH RULES... OR WITHOUT THEM

Connect with the realm of RPG rules using Criteria, a powerful and flexible scripting language explicitly designed for defining RPG systems. Create and customize rules for any RPG scenario, be it fantasy, sci-fi, or modern settings. Populate tables with weapons, abilities, and more, using spreadsheets that seamlessly integrate with Criteria. Multiverse Designer will launch with the 5 most used RPG systems already implemented using Criteria -- and more will follow! You can also dive into the universe of RPGs without the need to memorize complex rulebooks. With Criteria Core, players and game masters can fully enjoy the game without prior knowledge of any specific rules. Character sheets are automatically generated through simple questions, allowing for customization while Criteria Core assists game masters in making decisions. Degrees of success or failure are displayed, and newbie users are guided through the game.

DESIGN WORLDS IN SECONDS WITH PROCEDURAL GENERATION

Enter the world of procedural generation with the Asset Spawner! Create vast forests teeming with trees, bustling cities with towering buildings, or intricate dungeons with devious traps. The Asset Spawner generates assets quickly, providing a solid foundation that you can then refine to suit your specific needs. Seamlessly integrate with the Criteria Language to generate rules for traps, NPCs, and monsters.

CRAFT EVERY DETAIL TO MATCH YOUR VISION

You can create the foundation with the Asset Spawner, and then refine everything to your needs -- or craft everything from scratch with an intuitive drag-and-drop user interface and a vast library of +5000 assets, including buildings, props, animated characters, and more, for all kinds of settings (not just epic fantasy!). Customize appearances, create effects, and modify sizes, rotations, and positions to design environments that suit your vision. Whether it's adjusting the lighting of a scene, changing the color of a character, or transforming the texture of a wall, you can change and shape every asset to match your vision to the finest detail.

LIVE THE ADVENTURE WITH IMMERSIVE SOUND

Immerse yourself in the rich soundscape of Multiverse Designer. From crackling fires to echoing footsteps, experience dynamic sound effects that enhance the realism and immersion of your worlds. Sound is automatically added to assets with effects or movement, making every action come to life with audio. Imagine hearing while you play the sound of a dragon spitting fire, dogs barking, or the eerie wind howling through caves. You can also place Sound Totems at any location in the scene, adding custom sound effects and background music to further enhance the atmosphere.

SHARE YOUR CREATION

Connect and collaborate with fellow creators through the Multiverse Designer Library. Share and explore a vast collection of lights, scenes, environments, dice styles, encounters, and characters. Whether you're seeking inspiration or looking to expand your creative horizons, the Library offers a wealth of resources. Join our wonderful community of fellow-minded creative people to share your creations, adventures, characters, rulesets -- anything you can imagine!

movies.name: Take your fantasy tabletop RPG to the next level with Multiverse Designer
Create sci-fi worlds for your games with Multiverse Designer
Multiverse Designer - Lost city in the jungle
Multiverse Designer - The shadow over London

name: Multiverse Designer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700 HQ, AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 or equivalent 8GB GPU
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum 8GB VRAM GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400, AMD Ryzen 5 5500 or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070, AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT or equivalent GPU
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Multiverse Designer is a 3D virtual tabletop and map creator, a unique toolbox for storytellers. Create any kind of scene, environment, character or cutscenes you can imagine, for any setting from fantasy to sci-fi, horror, cyberpunk..., in the most immersive RPG experience you've ever played!
